description.value:
Also known as Lady Luck, Riadra is the goddess of opportunism, chance, and change. Riadra smiles on those who take risks, rely on luck, and live with levity.

Edicts: Take risks, use stealth and guile over violence, learn the rules and strategies of games of chance played wherever you travel, laugh at your own misfortune.

Anathema: Suffer a bully's insults to you or another without retort, attribute a lucky turn of events to your own skill, turn down a reasonable opportunity for gain.

Areas of Concern: Thieves' work, games of chance, fortune.
